Hero_Badge: The best way to rent items
Hero_Description: Loopable revolutionizes the concept of renting by providing an innovative platform that allows users to find the items they need, whenever and wherever they want
Features_1_Subtitle: We created Loopable with user experience in mind to make our app fast and easy to use.
Features_2_Subtitle: Before Loopable, renting took hours; now our app provides instant information on the items you want, eliminating unnecessary waits.
Features_3_Subtitle: You can rely on other users' reviews to understand which are the best products.
Question_WhatIs_Answer: It is a renting marketplace where you can easily rent and lend items, reduce waste and embrace a sharing economy.
Question_Earn_Answer: Turn your unused items into an additional source of income. By listing your items on the platform, you can attract potential renters and earn money without the need to sell or permanently part with belongings.
Question_Possibilities_Answer: Discover limitless potential with Loopable. From saving on equipment for one time events to finding your new favorite hobby, every rental opens doors to exciting opportunities.
Team_OurTeam_Description: Driven by our success at SVST Hackathon Verbania, our team is determined to redefine the untapped potential in Italy's rental market. Meet the passionate minds behind Loopable's transformative vision.
Team_Member_Maggy: Web developer and Computer Engineering Student. Driven to create great products through accurate execution.
Team_Member_Mattia: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience developing for the web and mobile. Idea seeker and enthusiastic about sharing them.
Business_Description: Maximize your business' potential and reach new heights with our Loopable for business plan.
Business_Manage_Description: Easily facilitate current and future rentals
MobileApp_Description: The app is not availbale yet, subscribe to our newsletter to be notified when it will become availbale
Footer_Description: Renting marketplace for earning and contributing in the circular economy.
